verses.verse: And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and spake<WG2036> unto them<WG846> again<WG3825> by<WG1722> parables<WG3850>, and said<WG3004>,

Again <WG3825> , he sent forth <WG649> other <WG243> servants <WG1401> , saying <WG3004> , Tell <WG2036> them which are bidden <WG2564> , Behold <WG2400> , I have prepared <WG2090> my <WG3450> dinner <WG712> : my <WG3450> oxen <WG5022> and <WG2532> my fatlings <WG4619> are killed <WG2380> , and <WG2532> all things <WG3956> are ready <WG2092> : come <WG1205> unto <WG1519> the marriage <WG1062> .

And <WG1161> the remnant <WG3062> took <WG2902> his <WG846> servants <WG1401> , and entreated them spitefully <WG5195> , and <WG2532> slew <WG615> them .

But <WG1161> when the king <WG935> heard <WG191> thereof , he was wroth <WG3710> : and <WG2532> he sent forth <WG3992> his <WG846> armies <WG4753> , and destroyed <WG622> those <WG1565> murderers <WG5406> , and <WG2532> burned up <WG1714> their <WG846> city <WG4172> .

Then <WG5119> saith he <WG3004> to his <WG846> servants <WG1401><WG3303> , The wedding <WG1062> is <WG2076> ready <WG2092> , but <WG1161> they which were bidden <WG2564> were <WG2258> not <WG3756> worthy <WG514> .
Go ye <WG4198> therefore <WG3767> into <WG1909> the highways <WG1327><WG3598> , and <WG2532> as many as <WG3745><WG302> ye shall find <WG2147> , bid <WG2564> to <WG1519> the marriage <WG1062> .

So <WG2532> those <WG1565> servants <WG1401> went out <WG1831> into <WG1519> the highways <WG3598> , and gathered together <WG4863> all <WG3956> as many as <WG3745> they found <WG2147> , both <WG5037> bad <WG4190> and <WG2532> good <WG18> : and <WG2532> the wedding <WG1062> was furnished <WG4130> with guests <WG345> .

¶ And <WG1161> when <WG1525> the king <WG935> came in <WG1525> to see <WG2300> the guests <WG345> , he saw <WG1492> there <WG1563> a man <WG444> which had <WG1746> not <WG3756> on <WG1746> a wedding <WG1062> garment <WG1742> :

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846> , Friend <WG2083> , how <WG4459> camest thou <WG1525> in hither <WG5602> not <WG3361> having <WG2192> a wedding <WG1062> garment <WG1742> ? And <WG1161> he was speechless <WG5392> .

Then <WG5119> said <WG2036> the king <WG935> to the servants <WG1249> , Bind <WG1210> him <WG846> hand <WG5495> and <WG2532> foot <WG4228> , and take <WG142> him <WG846> away <WG142> , and <WG2532> cast <WG1544> him into <WG1519> outer <WG1857> darkness <WG4655> ; there <WG1563> shall be <WG2071> weeping <WG2805> and <WG2532> gnashing <WG1030> of teeth <WG3599> .
For <WG1063> many <WG4183> are <WG1526> called <WG2822> , but <WG1161> few <WG3641> are chosen <WG1588> .
¶ Then<WG5119> went<WG4198> the Pharisees<WG5330>, and took<WG2983> counsel<WG4824> how<WG3704> they might entangle<WG3802> him<WG846> in<WG1722> his talk<WG3056>.

And<WG2532> they sent out<WG649> unto him<WG846> their<WG846> disciples<WG3101> with<WG3326> the Herodians<WG2265>, saying<WG3004>, Master<WG1320>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> thou art<WG1488> true<WG227>, and<WG2532> teachest<WG1321> the way<WG3598> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> truth<WG225><WG2532>, neither<WG3756> carest<WG3199> thou<WG4671> for<WG4012> any<WG3762> man: for<WG1063> thou regardest<WG991> not<WG1519><WG3756> the person<WG4383> of men<WG444>.
Tell<WG2036> us<WG2254> therefore<WG3767>, What<WG5101> thinkest<WG1380> thou<WG4671>? Is it lawful<WG1832> to give<WG1325> tribute<WG2778> unto Caesar<WG2541>, or<WG2228> not<WG3756>?

Shew <WG1925> me <WG3427> the tribute <WG2778> money <WG3546> . And<WG1161> they brought<WG4374> unto him<WG846> a penny<WG1220>.
And<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Whose <WG5101> is this <WG3778> image <WG1504> and <WG2532> superscription <WG1923> ?

They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Caesar's<WG2541>. Then<WG5119> saith he<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Render <WG591> therefore <WG3767> unto Caesar <WG2541> the things which are <WG3588> Caesar's <WG2541> ; and <WG2532> unto God <WG2316> the things that are <WG3588> God's <WG2316> .
When<WG2532> they had heard<WG191> these words, they marvelled<WG2296>, and<WG2532> left<WG863> him<WG846>, and went their way<WG565>.

¶ The same<WG1722><WG1565> day<WG2250> came<WG4334> to him<WG846> the Sadducees<WG4523>, which<WG3588> say<WG3004> that there is<WG1511> no<WG3361> resurrection<WG386>, and<WG2532> asked<WG1905> him<WG846>,

Saying<WG3004>, Master<WG1320>, Moses<WG3475> said<WG2036>, If<WG1437> a man<WG5100> die<WG599>, having<WG2192> no<WG3361> children<WG5043>, his<WG846> brother<WG80> shall marry<WG1918> his<WG846> wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> raise up<WG450> seed<WG4690> unto his<WG846> brother<WG80>.

Now<WG1161> there were<WG2258> with<WG3844> us<WG2254> seven<WG2033> brethren<WG80>: and<WG2532> the first<WG4413>, when he had married a wife<WG1060>, deceased<WG5053>, and<WG2532>, having<WG2192> no<WG3361> issue<WG4690>, left<WG863> his<WG846> wife<WG1135> unto his<WG846> brother<WG80>:
Likewise<WG3668> the second<WG1208> also<WG2532>, and<WG2532> the third<WG5154>, unto<WG2193> the seventh<WG2033>.
And<WG1161> last<WG5305> of all<WG3956> the woman<WG1135> died<WG599> also<WG2532>.
Therefore<WG3767> in<WG1722> the resurrection<WG386> whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> shall she be<WG2071> of the seven<WG2033>? for<WG1063> they all<WG3956> had<WG2192> her<WG846>.
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and<WG1161> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Ye do err <WG4105> , not <WG3361> knowing <WG1492> the scriptures <WG1124> , nor <WG3366> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> .

For <WG1063> in <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> they neither <WG3777> marry <WG1060> , nor <WG3777> are given in marriage <WG1547> , but <WG235> are <WG1526> as <WG5613> the angels <WG32> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> .

But <WG1161> as touching <WG4012> the resurrection <WG386> of the dead <WG3498> , have ye <WG314> not <WG3756> read <WG314> that which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> unto you <WG5213> by <WG5259> God <WG2316> , saying <WG3004> ,

I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the God <WG2316> of Abraham <WG11> , and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Isaac <WG2464> , and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Jacob <WG2384> ? God <WG2316> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> the God <WG2316> of the dead <WG3498> , but <WG235> of the living <WG2198> .
And<WG2532> when the multitude<WG3793> heard<WG191> this, they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> doctrine<WG1322>.
¶ But<WG1161> when the Pharisees<WG5330> had heard<WG191> that<WG3754> he had put<WG5392> the Sadducees<WG4523> to silence<WG5392>, they were gathered together<WG4863><WG1909><WG846>.
Then<WG2532> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them<WG846>, which was a lawyer<WG3544>, asked<WG1905> him a question, tempting<WG3985> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> saying<WG3004>,
Master<WG1320>, which<WG4169> is the great<WG3173> commandment<WG1785> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551>?

<WG1161>Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Thou shalt love <WG25> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God <WG2316> with <WG1722> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> heart <WG2588> , and <WG2532> with <WG1722> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> soul <WG5590> , and <WG2532> with <WG1722> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> mind <WG1271> .

And <WG1161> the second <WG1208> is like <WG3664> unto it <WG846><WG3778> , Thou shalt love <WG25> thy <WG4675> neighbour <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG4572> .
On <WG1722> these <WG5025> two <WG1417> commandments <WG1785> hang <WG2910> all <WG3650> the law <WG3551> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396> .
¶ While<WG1161> the Pharisees<WG5330> were gathered together<WG4863>, Jesus<WG2424> asked<WG1905> them<WG846>,
Saying<WG3004>, What <WG5101> think <WG1380> ye <WG5213> of <WG4012> Christ <WG5547> ? whose <WG5101> son <WG5207> is he <WG2076> ? They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, The Son of David<WG1138>.

If <WG1487> David <WG1138> then <WG3767> call <WG2564> him <WG846> Lord <WG2962> , how <WG4459> is he <WG2076> his <WG846> son <WG5207> ?

And<WG2532> no man<WG3762> was able<WG1410> to answer<WG611> him<WG846> a word<WG3056>, neither<WG3761> durst<WG5111> any<WG5100> man from<WG575> that<WG1565> day<WG2250> forth ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any more<WG3765> questions.
